verses.verse: These are the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to make <S%H3772><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, beside the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which he made <S%H3772><s%> with them in Horeb <S%H2722><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7200><s%>, You have seen all that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and unto all his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and unto all his land <S%H776><s%>;
The great <S%H1419><s%> temptations <S%H4531><s%> which your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%>, the signs <S%H226><s%>, and those great <S%H1419><s%> miracles <S%H4159><s%>:

Yet the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not given <S%H5414><s%> you an heart <S%H3820><s%> to perceive <S%H3045><s%>, and eyes <S%H5869><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%>, and ears <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And I have led <S%H3212><s%> you forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: your clothes <S%H8008><s%> are not grown old <S%H1086><s%> upon you <S%H5275><s%>, and your shoe is not grown old <S%H1086><s%> upon your foot <S%H7272><s%>.

You have not eaten <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, neither have you drunk <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong drink <S%H7941><s%>: that you might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And when you came <S%H935><s%> unto this place <S%H4725><s%>, Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us unto battle <S%H4421><s%>, and we struck them <S%H5221><s%>:

And we took <S%H3947><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> it for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>, and to the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4520><s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore the words <S%H1697><s%> of this covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H7919><s%>, that you may prosper in all that you do <S%H6213><s%>.

You stand <S%H5324><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> all of you before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>; your captains <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, your elders <S%H2205><s%>, and your officers <S%H7860><s%>, with all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>,

Your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, your wives <S%H802><s%>, and your stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is in <S%H7130><s%> your camp <S%H4264><s%>, from the hewer <S%H2404><s%> of your wood <S%H6086><s%> unto the drawer <S%H7579><s%> of your water <S%H4325><s%>:

That you should enter <S%H5674><s%> into covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and into his oath <S%H423><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> makes <S%H3772><s%> with you this day <S%H3117><s%>:

That he may establish <S%H6965><s%> you to day <S%H3117><s%> for a people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself <S%H430><s%>, and that he may be unto you a God, as he has said <S%H1696><s%> unto you <S%H7650><s%>, and as he has sworn unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
Neither with you only do I make <S%H3772><s%> this covenant <S%H1285><s%> and this oath <S%H423><s%>;

But with him that standeth <S%H5975><s%> here with us this <S%H3426><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, and also with him that is not here with us this day <S%H3117><s%>:

(For you know <S%H3045><s%> how we have lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and how we came <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which you passed by <S%H5674><s%>;

And you have seen <S%H7200><s%> their abominations <S%H8251><s%>, and their idols <S%H1544><s%>, wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone <S%H68><s%>, silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, which were among them:)

Lest there should be <S%H3426><s%> among you man <S%H376><s%>, or woman <S%H802><s%>, or family <S%H4940><s%>, or tribe <S%H7626><s%>, whose heart <S%H3824><s%> turneth away <S%H6437><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%>; lest there should be <S%H3426><s%> among you a root <S%H8328><s%> that bears <S%H6509><s%> gall <S%H7219><s%> and wormwood <S%H3939><s%>;

And it come to pass <S%H8085><s%>, when he hears the words <S%H1697><s%> of this curse <S%H423><s%>, that he bless <S%H1288><s%> himself in his heart <S%H3824><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I shall have peace <S%H7965><s%>, though <S%H3588><s%> I walk <S%H3212><s%> in the imagination <S%H8307><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%>, to add <S%H5595><s%> drunkenness <S%H7302><s%> to thirst <S%H6771><s%>:

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H14><s%> not spare <S%H5545><s%> him <S%H639><s%>, but then the anger of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and his jealousy <S%H7068><s%> shall smoke <S%H6225><s%> against that man <S%H376><s%>, and all the curses <S%H423><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> shall lie <S%H7257><s%> upon him <S%H3068><s%>, and the Lord shall blot out <S%H4229><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> from under heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall separate <S%H914><s%> him unto evil <S%H7451><s%> out of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, according to all the curses <S%H423><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%>:

So that the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come <S%H314><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> that shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you <S%H5237><s%>, and the stranger that shall come <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, shall say <S%H559><s%>, when they see <S%H7200><s%> the plagues <S%H4347><s%> of that land <S%H776><s%>, and the sicknesses <S%H8463><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has laid upon it <S%H2470><s%>;

And that the whole land <S%H776><s%> there is brimstone <S%H1614><s%>, and salt <S%H4417><s%>, and burning <S%H8316><s%>, that it is not sown <S%H2232><s%>, nor bears <S%H6779><s%>, nor any grass <S%H6212><s%> grows <S%H5927><s%> in it <S%H4114><s%>, like the overthrow of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, Admah <S%H126><s%>, and Zeboim <S%H6636><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> overthrew <S%H2015><s%> in his anger <S%H639><s%>, and in his wrath <S%H2534><s%>:

Even all nations <S%H1471><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Why has the Lord <S%H3068><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> thus unto this land <S%H776><s%>? what means the heat <S%H2750><s%> of this great <S%H1419><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>?

Then men shall say <S%H559><s%>, Because they have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, which he made <S%H3772><s%> with them when he brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>:

For they went <S%H3212><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> them <S%H430><s%>, gods whom they knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H2505><s%>, and whom he had not given unto them:

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against this land <S%H776><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> upon it all the curses <S%H7045><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%>:

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> rooted <S%H5428><s%> them out of their land <S%H127><s%> in anger <S%H639><s%>, and in wrath <S%H2534><s%>, and in great <S%H1419><s%> indignation <S%H7110><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into another <S%H312><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.

The secret <S%H5641><s%> things belong unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>: but those things which are revealed <S%H1540><s%> belong unto us and to our sons <S%H1121><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, that we may do <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%>.
